pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, March 16, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually meet with volunteers from Conquer COVID-19, a grassroots, volunteer-driven organization providing assistance to communities across Canada during the COVID-19 pandemic.

Closed to media.

2:20 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Member of Parliament for Saint John—Rothesay Wayne Long will virtually meet with front line workers from Parkland Saint John, a retirement living community in Saint John, New Brunswick.

Closed to media.
